pos_mean_info_list.mean: 易驾驶的；可操纵的；易改变位置的
统舱；舵效；操舵；驾驶；管理；士官的二等室

bilingual.source: The captain will steer the ship into the harbor.
bilingual.target: 船长将引导船只进入港口。

bilingual.source: He tried to steer the conversation away from politics.
bilingual.target: 他试图引导谈话远离政治话题。

bilingual.source: Parents often steer their children towards certain careers.
bilingual.target: 父母常常引导孩子走向某些职业。

bilingual.source: He used his experience to steer the project to success.
bilingual.target: 他利用自己的经验引导项目走向成功。

bilingual.source: The captain firmly grasped the tiller to steer the ship through the storm.
bilingual.target: 船长紧紧握住舵柄，引导船只穿过风暴。

bilingual.source: Accelerate and steer to past all opponents.
bilingual.target: 加速和引导过去的所有对手。

bilingual.source: Ultimately, only you can steer your life.
bilingual.target: 最终，只有你才能引导自己的生活。

bilingual.source: The GPS helped steer me into the right location.
bilingual.target: 全球定位系统引导我们找到了正确的位置.

bilingual.source: Just don ' t steer me over the monster ' s lair , okay !
bilingual.target: 引导我不在怪物的兽穴上方，好吗！

bilingual.source: Usin his music to steer it, sharin his views and his merits.
bilingual.target: 用他的音乐来引导, 分享他的观点和功劳.

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, is this how you steer your house? Does it really work?
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，你就是用它驾驶房子的? 真的管用吗?

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter. As long as we steer clear of whichever sector is active, we'll be safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无所谓了，避开活跃中的区域我们就安全。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe Tony's right. If, we have one hand on the wheel we can still steer. If we take it off...
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许托尼是对的，如果我们稍作妥协，就还有回旋余地，但如果彻底决裂……

yingyinNormal.en: The lab delivers us finished assets, and we show them to the public. Can we drop a steer, please?
yingyinNormal.zh: 实验室将成品交给我们，而我们负责向公众展示，麻烦放下食饵吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you owe it to Mr Crawley, to protect his work? To fight for the changes he made? To steer Downton in the right direction?
yingyinNormal.zh: 难道您不该替卡劳利先生保护他的遗志吗？努力维护他所做出的变革？让唐顿走上正确的道路？

yingyinNormal.en: You should never let other people steer your boat, Grandpa Pig. Yes, can you mend it? Of course, I just need to size up the damage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要好好保护你的船啊，可不能让别人驾驶他，猪爷爷。额，你能修好它吗。当然可以我要先来量量这个洞有多大。

yingyinNormal.en: It's very good of you to steer the boat, Gramppy Rabbit. But I'm not steering the boat. I thought somebody else was. Oh, dear. No one is steering the boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你去驾船真好，兔爷爷。但是我并没有在驾船，我想有其他人在驾船。哦，天哪，没有人在驾船。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Far less certain, however, is how successfully experts and bureaucrats can select our peer groups and <highlight>steer</highlight> their activities in virtuous directions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，专家和官僚们如何成功地选择我们的同行群体，并引导他们的活动向良性方向发展，则远没有那么确定。

examination_example.sentence: Can doing one's homework really <highlight>steer</highlight> families to the best places?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做作业真的能把家庭引向最好的地方吗？

examination_example.sentence: Imagine you enter a car with no <highlight>steering</highlight> wheel, no brake or accelerator pedals (踏板) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，你踏进一辆没有方向盘、没有刹车或油门踏板的汽车 。
